text: Teuma Po gata Pengampon that-that Keu ureueng sisat rahmat Neulimpah Meunyo Neupeutron azeub raya that Jinoe le siat anco dum bicah Sabab han jitem pateh Hadharat Di jih sit batat tungang sileupah Tapi di Tuhan han Neupeuceupat Neuyue preh siat janji Neupeugah Meunyo ka teuka azeub Hadharat Hana le ubat wahe meutuah
